author: Duarte Mendonca, CNN
title: A sports junkie adjusts to life without any sport
description: Unless you're Jared Leto living in isolation in the desert, you've probably been impacted by the spread of coronavirus (only teasing, Jared! You're good!)
content:
(CNN)Unless you're Jared Leto living in isolation in the desert, you've probably been impacted by the spread of coronavirus (only teasing, Jared! You're good!)
I'm writing this from my living room after CNN urged its employees to work from home.
So far, so … [+7286 chars]
